events.message: I recently purchased a blender from your store, but it arrived not working properly and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to a faulty product received by the customer.
A customer support representative has been assigned to handle the refund request for the faulty blender.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your blender arrived not working. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and some photos of the blender showing the issue so we can quickly process your refund?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. I’ve attached pictures showing the blender won’t turn on at all.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund and send you a prepaid shipping label to return the faulty blender.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this quickly. I will send the blender back as soon as I receive the label.
Your refund has been processed and the shipping label sent to your email. We appreciate your patience and are sorry for the inconvenience.
We’re following up to confirm you have successfully returned the blender and received your refund without any issues.
Yes, I received the shipping label, sent the blender back yesterday, and the refund appeared in my account today. Thanks again!
We are glad your refund issue is fully resolved. Thank you for contacting us, and have a wonderful day!
